name: PHContentEditingInputRequestOptions
desc: A set of options affecting the delivery of image or video data when you request to edit the content of a Photos asset.

items.name: var canHandleAdjustmentData: (PHAdjustmentData) -> Bool
items.desc: A block to be called when Photos needs to determine whether your app can continue previous edits made to an asset.

items.name: var isNetworkAccessAllowed: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether Photos can download the asset from iCloud.

items.name: var progressHandler: ((Double, UnsafeMutablePointer<ObjCBool>) -> Void)?
items.desc: A block Photos calls periodically while downloading the asset.
